relproducts.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Rimini Rose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.
